name: Coffetaker
description:
Made for trijam in 3-4 hours!

WSAD to move, Shift to dodge, Ctrl to fall, Space to jump (you can triple jump)

Pandemonica sprites are not mine and are property of @vanripperart https://twitter.com/vanripperart!

Font used is Stop Bullying https://www.dafont.com/stop-bullying.font

this is just a fan game lol
